styleguide-02.title: The Styleguide

authors.name: Gotham Organizers
authors.description: We're a collective of volunteers that have somehow or another found ourselves organizing together for many years.

authors.name: Rad Community Member
authors.description: Contributing is super easy. You just need a Github account. We've got direction publshed. If you need help, contact the organizers.

styleguide-02.summary: Another sample blog post used to demonstrate the blog styleguide. This one has multiple authors.

styleguide.title: GothamSass Blog Styleguide!

authors.name: Gotham Organizers
authors.description: We're a collective of volunteers that have somehow or another found ourselves organizing together for many years.

styleguide.summary: Welcome to GothamSass. You've stumbled across one of our styleguide posts. We use these posts to demonstrate the possibilities you have with your posts. Hopefully you find them helpful. If you still have questions, tweet at us or email the organizers.
